home.pageContent1: Welcome to Easy Pay - your fast way for creating payment slip.!
home.pageContent2: What Easy Pay brings to you?
home.pageContent21: Easy pay is inovative aplication which gives you simple way for creating paymnet slips - fast and easy. No matter if you are you regular user who wants to pay bills fast or business user who needs to create a lot of payment slips, Easy pay is here to makes your life simple.
home.pageContent31: Create payment slip in seconds: Payment slips can be created in few clicks. Enter required data and that is it. With Easy pay, process of creating payment slips is simple like never before.
home.pageContent41: Generate PDF report: Easy Pay has option for creating PDF reports with all data in transaction. Track your finance on efficient way and have information of your payments in one place.
home.pageContent51: QR code for fast payment: Scan QR code and finish your payment quicly! Easy pay generates QR codes for every transaction, with this payment proccess is more practical and faster.
home.pageContent6: Can be used by private and business users:
home.pageContent61: Can be used by private and business users: Whether you are regular user who wants to pay your bills fast and easy or business user who has need for generating a lot of payment slips, Easy pay is designed to satisfy all your needs.
home.pageContent7: Register today and improve your business or get on time with Easy pay!
